description:
Nishi and Ayako run into each other as they arrive at school. Ayako`s musings about Nishi`s scooter are interrupted when they run into another member of the tennis club doing something rather strange on the stairs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Get Out of the Way, Horse Coming Through, with Kouhai, Get Out of the Way
Kouhai to Soko no Ke Soko no Ke Oba ga Tooru
後輩と そこのけそこのけ お馬が通る
